participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: imaginative and whimsical, with a longing for companionship and adventure.
participant_1.background: i am a little girl. i like to make time stop. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i'm very lonely.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: brave and resilient, with a hint of mischief and a strong sense of loyalty.
participant_2.background: i was born with my heart outside my body. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i'm a boy.
